vulnerabilities.name: Potential XSS Vector
vulnerabilities.description: Form input 'email' could be a vector for XSS attacks
vulnerabilities.remediation: Implement input validation and output encoding

vulnerabilities.name: Missing Input Validation
vulnerabilities.description: Form input '_token' lacks client-side validation attributes
vulnerabilities.remediation: Add pattern and maxlength attributes for client-side validation
